data.title: Unik Public Image
data.meta_description: Who We Are unik, a leading Israeli public relations firm, is engaged in generating public exposure, helping companies, organizations and people promote ideas and accomplish their business goals while abiding by their values. Since 2023, unik is the exclusive Israeli partner of PROI Worldwide, the most award-winning PR agency network in the world. Our clients […]
data.text:
unik, a leading Israeli public relations firm, is engaged in generating public exposure, helping companies, organizations and people promote ideas and accomplish their business goals while abiding by their values.

Since 2023, unik is the exclusive Israeli partner of PROI Worldwide, the most award-winning PR agency network in the world. Our clients profit from the world’s best PR know-how and local expertise.

https://www.proi.com/

With our multidisciplinary expertise, handpicked professionals and extensive connections in all the right places, we’re here to help you change things for the better.

In a reality where marketing messages and image positioning are constantly being challenged, unik offers its clients a complete and comprehensive suite of services – crisis management, strategic/media consulting, public relations, and activity encompassing all digital content channels.

As we work towards the goal, we use every possible platform that is suited to getting the brand concept and story across – Israeli and international media, social media, direct marketing, as well as every junction where the target audience is potentially present and brand image can be shaped.

Since unik’s establishment in 2003, we have accumulated exceptional expertise in the effective management of crises that have shaped, and continue to shape, the Israeli public agenda; we have unveiled brands and made them part of the relevant public discourse; we have defended brands and people against targeted or comprehensive public attacks; we have led campaigns in conjunction with regulatory bodies; we have furthered especially complex content issues, requiring absolute control and knowledge of the interfaces and junctures between the different sectors (public, third and business); we have devised marketing campaigns with creatives that have generated talk that spread like wildfire; we have created differentiated branded content worlds; and the list goes on.
